mapper.sql: id, label, name, url_address, login_account, login_pwd, finance_num, main_num, auto, remark, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
from t_platform_info order by id desc

select
from t_platform_info where 1 = 1
and label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and name like '%${name}%'
order by id desc
